Use an alarm clock as a time capsule: Fill the clock with small items that represent a specific time period, and bury it in the ground. When the time comes, dig up the clock and see how much has changed.
Use an alarm clock as a decorative object: Use the clock as a decorative object in your room by hanging it on the wall or placing it on a table as a centerpiece.
Use an alarm clock as a weather station: Use the clock's alarm to keep track of the time of day and the weather conditions outside.
Use an alarm clock as a reminder of important dates: Use the clock's alarm to remind you of important dates, such as birthdays, anniversaries, and deadlines.
Use an alarm clock as a portable speaker: Use the clock's built-in speaker to play music or podcasts while you get ready in the morning.
